sentences.en: Duchess Satin is not suitable for slinky , bias - cut gowns as it is too stiff.
sentences.cn: 由于这种缎很硬,故不适用于那种曲线 、 斜线裁剪.

sentences.en: Duchess Satin works best in formal, structured gowns with petticoats worn underneath, especially A - Line silhouettes.
sentences.cn: 这种缎最适合在正式场合服用的裙子的内衬, 尤其是侧面的直线状内衬.

sentences.en: It's a Cheshire cat,'said the Duchess ,'and that's why.
sentences.cn: “ 请允许我介绍,这是我的朋友——柴郡猫. ” 爱丽丝说.

sentences.en: Photographs of the Duchess of York Sunbathing in France, for example, have been widely published.
sentences.cn: 例如, 约克女公爵在法国日光浴的照片曾经被广泛刊登.

sentences.en: She bears the title of Duchess; He held the governorship for almost a decade.
sentences.cn: 她拥有女公爵的头衔; 他担任了近十年的总督.

sentences.en: The Dowager Duchess lives in a grace and favour apartment at Hampton Court.
sentences.cn: 那个公爵遗孀居住在汉普顿大楼饮赐的公寓内.

sentences.en: The Duchess levelled a deadly look at Nikko.
sentences.cn: 女公爵目光冷峻地盯着尼科。

sentences.en: The girl could pass herself off in three months as a duchess at an ambassador's party.
sentences.cn: 那个女孩能够在三个月后由一位大使举办的舞会上冒充一位女公爵.

sentences.en: The territory ruled by a duke or duchess; a dukedom.
sentences.cn: 公爵或女爵的领地; 公国.

words.tran_cn: 公爵的；公爵领地的；象公爵的
公国；公爵领地；直辖领地
公爵夫人；女公爵；雍容华贵的妇女；小老板娘

trans.tran_cn: 公爵夫人或公爵遗孀，女公爵，气度威严的妇女
trans.tran_en: a woman with the highest social rank outside the royal family, or the wife of a  duke
